top.title: Iran supreme leader admits thousands killed during recent protests
top.summary: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei says some deaths were “inhuman” and “savage” but blames the US.

top.title: Big names on Trump's peace panel face huge challenges in Gaza
top.summary: Whatever the concerns and complexities, it remains the only plan in town, with many world leaders pledging to support it, writes John Sudworth.

top.title: US judge restricts ICE response to Minneapolis protesters
top.summary: The legal order comes ahead of planned weekend protests and counter protests in the city amid ongoing immigration enforcement actions.

top.title: ChatGPT to carry adverts for some users
top.summary: OpenAI is also expanding its cheaper subscription tier, ChatGPT Go, to all countries where it operates.

top.title: Mother of Elon Musk's child sues xAI over Grok deepfakes
top.summary: The parent company of X and Grok, xAI, launched a counter-suit saying she had violated its terms of service.

top.title: Use film-style age ratings to limit teens' social media, say Lib Dems
top.summary: The Conservatives want to see ban of all under-16s from social media, but the Lib Dems say that would be a "blunt instrument".

title.#text: Disney deleted a Thread because people kept quoting its movies at it
